general.name: Enable XP
general.tip: Disabling will prevent anyone from gaining XP, but will not reset or remove existing XP.

general.name: Min XP
general.desc: Minimum amount of XP to earn per message
general.tip: Each message gives a random amount of XP, this changes the lower bound

general.name: Max XP
general.desc: Maximum amount of XP to earn per message
general.tip: Each message gives a random amount of XP, this changes the upper bound

general.name: XP Cooldown
general.desc: Members must wait this many seconds before they can gain XP again
general.tip: Messages sent during the cooldown period will not gain

general.name: Level cap
general.desc: The highest level members can reach
general.tip: Members can still gain XP past this, unless you reward a role with a 0x multiplier

general.name: Enable Voice XP
general.desc: Allows members to gain Voice XP
general.tip: Disabling will prevent anyone from gaining Voice XP, but will not reset or remove existing Voice XP.

general.name: Min XP
general.desc: Multiplier for vc xp to message xp
general.tip: 0 means no xp, 1 means equal xp

level.name: Enable level up message
level.desc: Sends a message or DM when a member levels up

level.name: Level up multiple
level.desc: Only sends the level up message when reaching a multiple of this number
level.tip: A multiple of 5 sends on levels 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, ...

level.name: Level up multiple cap
level.desc: After reaching this level, the level up multiple is no longer used and a message is posted on every level reached

level.name: Manual sync
level.desc: Allows members to manually sync their roles whenever they want, via /sync

level.name: Sync warning
level.desc: Show a warning message in /rank when a member's roles aren't synced properly

rank.name: Enable /rank
rank.tip: Disabling this also hides most info in /calculate

rank.name: Hide /rank messages
rank.desc: Forces /rank messages to be ephemeral, meaning only the member who typed the commmand can see it

rank.name: Hide cooldown
rank.desc: Hides the amount of time until XP can be gained again

rank.name: Show relative XP
rank.desc: Changes the 'next level' section of /rank to start at 0 and only include XP from that level
rank.tip: e.g. If level 10 requires 2000 XP and level 11 requires 3000, it will display "500/1000 XP until level 11" for a member with 2500 XP

rank.name: Private leaderboard
rank.desc: Restricts the online leaderboard so only server members can access it (requires logging in)

rank.name: Hide reward roles
rank.desc: Hides the list of reward roles on the online leaderboard

rank.name: Hide /leaderboard messages
rank.desc: Forces /leaderboard messages to be ephemeral, meaning only the member who typed the commmand can see it

rank.name: Minimum leaderboard level
rank.desc: Restricts the leaderboard to only show members above this level

rank.name: Max leaderboard entries
rank.desc: Only shows the top X members on the leaderboard
